meta.content: Santa Fe Trail USD 434 - COVID-19 Information

Kansas Department of Health & Environment is a great resource for information regarding coronavirus (COVID-19).
The graphics below offer some guidance with dealing with isolation and taking care of yourself and your family.
More information may be found at www.kdheks.gov/coronavirus...

div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 10:53 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. Windy, with a north wind 25 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Breezy, with a northwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 74. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
